item.title: Motorcycle Travel Around Xinjiang
item.description: Motorcycle Tour Around Xinjiang Copyright: The following pictures are copyrighted by me, all commercial use is prohibited, if you need commercial use, please contact me for authorization, infringement will be punished! 2023.8.2 Beijing – Bayannaoer Linhe Service Area 2023.8.3 Bayannaoer river service area - Ejin Banner 2023.8.3 Ejin Banner – Hami 2023.8.5 Hami - Barkol Altun Street Hami Cultural Hall 哈密回王墓 天山庙 巴里坤草原 2023.8.6 巴里坤-吐鲁番-乌鲁木齐 巴里坤糊 天山无人区峡谷 吐峪沟麻扎村 2023.8.7 乌鲁木齐 2023.
